page.title: 19RAFT RACE
page.content: Every year,close to Gala Week, there is the famous Raft Race down the River Tay between Kenmore and Aberfeldy. Each raft,crewed by eight including a female,paddles the six miles in fierce,vocal competition. Dozens of rafts take part,each with distinctive markings and crew uniforms. The parade before the Race decides the best decked raft and the crew with 'originality' in dress. Many long hours can go into practice for this prestigious event which is a test of stamina and team spirit. On the day of the Race,the area may have as many as 20,000 visitors. Emergency services are stepped up by drafting from nearby areas for the day.
